data.title: St. James the Apostle Parish
data.meta_description: Just as St. James participated in the miracle of the loaves and fishes, so we too are invited to participate as a faith community in the miracle of the Eucharist where all will be fed We are a vibrant and growing community with many activities for young and old that draw us closer to God.We…
data.text:
Just as St. James participated in the miracle of the loaves and fishes, so we too are invited to participate as a faith community in the miracle of the Eucharist where all will be fed

We are a vibrant and growing community with many activities for young and old that draw us closer to God.

We are centered in the Eucharist and we personally invite you to celebrate this Sacrament with us each week.

It is around the table of the Lord that we are fed and nourished.

our Mission Statement

As members of Christ’s family, through St. James the Apostle Parish, we:

Worship the Lord by proclaiming His Word and celebrating His Sacraments;

Grow by learning more about God’s loving plan for us;

Respond to the call of Christ by sharing our talents, gifts and our love;

Reach out to the universal community by loving and serving our neighbors.

Follow@StJamesGE
